action.description: The committee on WAL recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 8 Ayes: Representative(s) Hashem, Lamosao, Belatti, Ichiyama, Iwamoto, Morikawa, Souza; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Shimizu;  Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Poepoe, Woodson.
